articles.content: When CVS Health abruptly announced that high-profile CEO Karen Lynch was leaving immediately, to be replaced by company executive David Joyner, another announcement followed in smaller type: Roger Fa… [+3893 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Wu
articles.title: The world’s largest internet archive is under siege — and fighting back - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hackers struck the Internet Archive, leaking millions of users’s data and causing founder Brewster Kahle to take a sprawling library of online history offline.
articles.content: There are few organizations dedicated to the gargantuan task of preserving the vast, ever-shifting record of human activity that is the internet. The largest such record belongs to a nonprofit based … [+7488 chars]
